title: The Christ 1-5 (Kingstone)
description:
OK everyone, we here at the LTS Comic Book Emporium hopes that all of us are enlightened enough to allow for the facts that everyone should be able to enjoy comic books, and that the same topic and/or subject matter can be discussed from many different points of view. Basically, please keep it civil.

All of the Kingstone comics are faith based in the Christian religion, usually dealing directly with a person or story from the Bible. 

-----------------------------------------------------

The Christ 1-5 (missing volume 6)

Kingstone Comics, 2010-2014, 36 pages each

V1 The incredible story of the Incarnation - God become flesh.
V2 The early years of Christ plus special section on the prophetess Anna.
V3 Jesus is baptized by John the Baptist, faces the devil in the wilderness...
V4 The calling of the first disciples and the first miracles.
V5 Parables, a centurion, resurrection at Nain and beheading of John.

Written by Ben Avery

Illustrated by Sergio Cariello, Tod Smith

Colored by Zach Matheny, Fabricio Guaerra
